bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. I'm red and black. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots on my back
🔴 My color is like a fire truck
🍃 I like to land on leaves

bug.question: I have wings and like flowers. I can be different colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I visit pretty blossoms
🦋 I start as a caterpillar
🌈 You see many colors on my wings

bug.question: I live in a hill with all my friends. I carry things that are bigger than me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small
🧺 I work together to carry food
🏘️ I live underground in a colony

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I sting when I'm mad. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I am known for my buzzing sound
🍯 I create something sweet
🌼 I collect nectar from flowers

bug.question: I jump very high and I am green. I make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat plants
🐸 Even though I am green, I'm not a frog!
🦗 I make noise by rubbing my legs together

bug.question: I glow in the dark on summer nights. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up at night
🪲 I am a beetle
🌃 You can see me in the dark

bug.question: I can walk on walls and make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I make a trap
🕷️ I have eight legs
🏠 I can live inside your house

bug.question: I change into a butterfly. First, I munch on leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I crawl before I fly
🥬 I eat lots of green plants
🏡 I live inside a chrysalis

bug.question: I am black and buzzy and like to bite. I leave itchy red bumps. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can fly
🩸 I drink blood
🌃 I bite you mostly at night

bug.question: I have long legs and like to hop. I can blend in with the sticks and leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like a small branch
🍃 I hide among leaves
🧍 I have very long and thin legs

ocean.question: I am big and blue and have lots of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm home to many animals.
🚢 Boats can sail on me.
🐳 I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast!
🏡 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.

ocean.question: I am a fish with orange and white stripes.  I hide in sea anemones. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am a popular movie character.
🧡 I am brightly colored.
🏠 The anemone protects me from predators.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have a lot of arms!
🐙 I can change color to hide.
🌈 I am very clever and can solve puzzles.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean. I sing songs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I can be very loud underwater.
🐳 I am bigger than a car!
💨 I need to come to the surface to breathe air.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. I walk sideways on the beach. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I like to hide under rocks.
🐾 I move in a funny way.
🦞 Some people like to eat me with butter!

ocean.question: I am a very old and slow reptile with a shell who swims in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs in the sand.
🥕 I eat seaweed and jellyfish.
👵 I can live for a very long time.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with lots of sharp teeth. People are often scared of me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🌊 I have a fin on my back.
🦷 I have rows and rows of pointy teeth!

ocean.question: I am a very small, colorful fish that looks like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I swim upright.
✨ I am very delicate and graceful.
🌊 I live in shallow waters and coral reefs.

ocean.question: I am a jellyfish that looks like a lion's mane, and I am very big. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 My tentacles are long and flowing.
🥶 I live in cold waters.
☠️ I can sting you!
